statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address='123 Main Street';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address = '123 Main St' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address FROM transaction_details WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sender_address;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'user123' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address IN ('address1', 'address2', 'address3') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE sender_address = '123 Street';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_name, sender_address FROM Senders WHERE sender_id = 5;
SELECT receiver_id, receiver_name, receiver_address FROM Receivers WHERE receiver_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_name, amount FROM Senders JOIN Transactions ON Senders.sender_address = Transactions.sender_address;
SELECT receiver_name, amount FROM Receivers JOIN Transactions ON Receivers.receiver_address = Transactions.receiver_address WHERE receiver_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name FROM Senders JOIN Transactions ON Senders.sender_address = Transactions.sender_address JOIN Receivers ON Receivers.receiver_address = Transactions.receiver_address;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Transactions;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email, sender_phone FROM sender_addresses ORDER BY sender_name DESC;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_email, receiver_phone FROM receiver_addresses WHERE receiver_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT history_id, action, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE action = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email FROM sender_addresses WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_phone FROM receiver_addresses WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY receiver_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT th.history_id, th.action, td.sender_address, rd.receiver_address FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_details td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id JOIN receiver_addresses rd ON td.receiver_address = rd.receiver_id WHERE th.action = 'refund' AND td.amount > 500;

SELECT sd.sender_name, rd.receiver_name, td.amount FROM transaction_details td JOIN sender_addresses sd ON td.sender_address = sd.sender_id JOIN receiver_addresses rd ON td.receiver_address = rd.receiver_id WHERE td.timestamp < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM sender_addresses;
SELECT sender_name, sender_address FROM sender_addresses ORDER BY sender_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM receiver_addresses WHERE receiver_id = 3;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_address, transaction_details.amount FROM receiver_addresses JOIN transaction_details ON receiver_addresses.receiver_id = transaction_details.receiver_id;

SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, transaction_details.amount, timestamp FROM sender_addresses JOIN transaction_details ON sender_addresses.sender_id = transaction_details.sender_id JOIN receiver_addresses ON transaction_details.receiver_id = receiver_addresses.receiver_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_name, sender_address FROM sender_addresses ORDER BY sender_name;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_address FROM receiver_addresses WHERE receiver_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT th.history_id, th.status, tl.log_message FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_log tl ON th.transaction_id = tl.log_id;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, amount FROM sender_addresses sa INNER JOIN transaction_details td ON sa.sender_id = td.sender_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
